Contact Saver for WhatsApp

EXTENSION FEATURES

‚û°Ô∏è Export thousands of contacts, instantly

Contact Saver quickly exports (even unsaved!) numbers to a spreadsheet, so you can see and analyze all your contacts in one place. It‚Äôll also match names to phone numbers if individuals have included it in their profiles.
